name: Nightblade Mystic Adventure Demo (Updated)
description:
Looking to explore the land of Tesori and save the land from being destroyed by evil, then download Nightblade Mystic Adventure today and step into the land of Tesori to play as the Mystic Warriors.

Reminder: This game is currently in development and will be completed sometime next year, so for now here's the Demo of Nightblade Mystic Adventure until then.

Please follow the game's development via Twitter/Instagram at the links below:

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/OfficialNightb1

Instagram:  https://instagram.com/nightblademysticadventure21?utm_medium=copy_link

Please Subscribe to the game's Youtube Channel to see walkthroughs in case you ever get stuck somewhere and need help with something:

https://youtube.com/channel/UCzUR0xaVTeF8EUsoLohd4mA

Please join the link below to gain access to the game's Discord Server, so you can talk about your gameplay, report any bugs/glitches/softlocks that was missed, or even share your in-game progress with other player:  https://discord.gg/dskEBVBTq2
